TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content:
Unfortunately, yes, but someone else might be able to help.

No problem Hopefully someone else spots this and takes up my order, that or one of my fail attempts turn into a sucess... chances of that happening are low though lol.
Any orders today, I need something to do im running outta designs.

lol zapy i think a hover craft is unpossble you have to get exact that speed to stay at the same level i dont i used damned aerodynamics to try another dysing but it wont hover to baicly it was an unmand MMI module on top of a fuel tank and four engines but it jujst got up down up down when i tryd to find the static vertical speed of it iv seen a youtube video where it had hover tanks but i think it uses somme mod i dont know of becuas with stock parts it wont work to so i dont know how to do it

the only thing that could get close to the hovercraft you want is a VTOL with RCS to move it and maby slowly build your speed up with the rcs but that needs a lot of rcs fuel and then you have to build a huge VTOL

Edited September 16, 2012 by alline1999
Eh guys can I get my order done? Hammaneggs doesn't want it.

Hello, Voyager Labs!

I am Plaatinum Aerospace, your new receptionist!

I have experience in this position from Gold Stingray Inc. (Now defunct)

I take orders in the form of a PM then relay them to an engineer for construction.

Thanks,

Plaatinum Aerospace
yea shure whats your order ?
Great we finally have a receptionist!
What do you mean by using the atmosphere? Like parachutes?
I need a plane capable of flying around the world at least once. No orbits though please.
Welcome Plaatinum , Lol sorry I didn't see you posted, I was riding outta town.

Happy Birthday Zapy and I'm still trying to work out the VTOL, It's not impossible just a Very big maybe ATM. Also updated the main Post.

well flying around the world why ? ah never mind. iv a spaceplane capeble flying more than half way dont realy tested the max distance yet but i know it had fuel to space so let me try that. maby i can use that space plane and improve it a bit

Edited September 17, 2012 by alline1999
I got the order blog done http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/entry.php/112-Voyager-Labs-Order-Blog

I'm confused on what these corporations or organizations are for.

And their "orders".

Are they just for taking requests on challenges? That's what it seems like.

I'm interested in your satellites, do you use a mod for them and how do you get them to orbit?

Say there is a Sattelite you want but you cant get it into orbit, You place an order and we will try our best to build a launcher. Our sattelites use Probodyne and ISA Map Sat and I use the Plooto I Cargo Variant.

The Plooto II is going together nicely and should be ready for orders within two weeks.

This is a pic of the Docking variant ready to dock with Voyage Labs tonight.
Good Luck From Kerbol!
Good to see ya back Mnmm1234, I have some projects for you.

What are they?
